channel.title: html on HSMINT's BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in html on HSMINT's BLOG

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Example
item.description: Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 $ x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a} $ Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this. Link I’m an inline-style link I’m an inline-style link with title I’m a reference-style link I’m a relative reference to a repository file
